comments:
Create a new "Dynamic Web Project" targeted at the J2EE Preview server. Create a new JSP with the wizard and choose the template "New JSP File (html)". Choose "Run on Server" with the new JSP.

Result:
Starting preview server

Port 8080
Modules:
  xmlform

Evidently some repackaging or dependency changes in Orbit have caused us to now require org.apache.commons.el as well. I've got a fix in hand for 3.0 M3, will check out 2.0.
Fix released to 2.0.2 and 3.0 M3 builds.
